settings.desc__cont:
Makes combing through hair, tangle-free, a breeze. The no-rinse formula couldnâ€™t be simpler to use, at home or on-the-go. A juicy tropical scent smells like summer all year long. Designed for all hair types, the long-lasting benefits make Luscious Locks a haircare must-have.

  • Each & Every Ingredient Ranks #1 on EWG Skin Deep
  • Contains Only Natural Fragrance Ingredients (and smells heavenly!)
  • Certified Cruelty Free: With No Animal Testing
  • Certified Vegan: With No Animal Derived Ingredients
  • Easy to Use, No-Rinse Formula
settings.dire__cont: Spray Luscious Locks Leave-In Conditioner onto slightly damp hair from mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Do not rinse out. Blow dry or allow hair to air dry. Style hair as usual. Use regularly for best results.
settings.ingr__cont:
• Organic Jojoba Oil makes hair feel silky smooth and soft
  • Organic Virgin Olive Oil makes hair feel thicker and healthier
  • Organic Avocado Oil lends the appearance of voluminous hair
  • Organic Bhringraj prevents the appearance of hair loss and visibly improves hair growth
  • Organic Hibiscus offers a soothing feel to skin, ideal for those with sensitive scalp
  • Organic Amla moisturizes the scalp and makes hair feel strong
  • Organic Horsetail lends a reparative feel to damaged hair tissue, and makes hair look healthy and vibrant
  • Organic Green Tea boosts the appearance of hair growth and visibly improves split ends
